settings.text:
We are seeking an enthusiastic and motivated Womenswear Retail Associate to join our team. The ideal candidate will be a fashion-conscious individual with a passion for providing excellent customer service.

Wage starting at $16/hr for weekday, $18/hr on weekends. 14-32 hours per week available depending on schedule.

Responsibilities:

- Greet and assist customers in a friendly and professional manner

- Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction through excellent sales service

- Maintain in-depth knowledge of current fashion trends and products

- Assist with maintaining a clean and organized sales floor

- Receive and process payments through various sales transactions

- Perform inventory management and restocking duties

- Collaborate with team members to achieve sales targets and customer satisfaction goals

Requirements:

- High school diploma, or equivalent required

- Previous retail experience highly valued

- Strong communication and interpersonal skills

- Ability to work well in a team environment

- Availability to work flexible hours, including weekends and holidays

- Passion for fashion and staying up-to-date on current trends

We are currently seeking a Womenswear Clothing Buyer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of current fashion trends, excellent communication skills, and a sizable knowledge background of the current fashion scene and secondhand markets, as well as a defined personal taste in clothing.

Wage starting at $17/hr for weekday, $18/hr on weekends. 14-32 hours per week available depending on schedule.

Responsibilities:

- Identify and source new products and brands that align with our company's vision and target audience.

- Manage inventory levels and product flow to ensure the right products are available at the right time.

- Keep up-to-date with current fashion trends and industry developments to inform buying decisions.

- Utilize various online secondhand market platforms to gather inventory at a desirable rate

- Ability to simultaneously switch between duties as a retail associate and buyer

Requirements:

- High school diploma, or equivalent required

- Previous retail experience highly valued

- Strong analytical skills

- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

- Knowledge of retail math and inventory management principles

- Passion for fashion and staying up-to-date on current trends

Our store is seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Retail Floor Manager to oversee the daily operations of our retail store.

Wage starting at $20/hr. 24-32 hours per week available depending on schedule.

Responsibilities:

- Manage and train a team of sales associates to provide excellent customer service

- Monitor inventory levels and consult with upper management as needed

- Ensure visual merchandising standards are met and maintain a clean and organized store

- Analyze retail processes and make recommendations for improvement

- Handle customer complaints and resolve issues in a timely and professional manner

- Help create and coordinate schedules for sales associates

-Collaborate with upper management to develop and implement store policies and procedures

Requirements:

- High school diploma, or equivalent required

- Previous retail management experience highly valued

- Strong leadership and communication skills

- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple tasks simultaneously

- Knowledge of retail operations, including inventory management and visual merchandising

- Availability to work flexible hours
